i1.blurb: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Ziggs's''' [[basic attack]]s periodically deal {{as|{{pp|18|20|24|28|32|36|40|48|56|64|72|80|88|100|112|124|136|148|160|formula = 16+4 per level up to 6, then+8 per level up to 12, and then+12 per level up to 18}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|3|showtype=true|key=%|30 to 50|1 to 13}} AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}, doubled to {{as|{{pp|18|40|48|56|64|72|80|96|112|128|144|160|176|200|224|248|272|296|320|formula = 32+8 per level up to 6, then+16 per level up to 12, and then+24 per level up to 18}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|3|showtype=true|key=%|30*2 to 50*2|1 to 13}} AP)}} against structures.
'''Ziggs''' reduces ''Short Fuse's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{pp|3|showtype=true|4 to 6|1 to 13}} seconds whenever he uses an [[Champion ability|ability]].
i1.name: Short Fuse
notes: * {{Pending for test}}: ''Short Fuse's'' interaction with {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon}}, and {{tip|blind}}.
* ''Short Fuse'' will only apply to the primary target if ''Ziggs'' has purchased {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}.

q1.blurb: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' throws a bouncing bomb to the target area, exploding upon contacting an enemy, the terrain or reaching the end of its trajectory. The bomb can bounce up to twice, the distance traveled each time based on how far it was originally thrown.
When exploding the ''Bouncing Bomb'' deals {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies.
q1.name: Bouncing Bomb
notes: * ''Bouncing Bomb'' obeys game physics (can be thrown or bounce over units/terrain if there is sufficient air time).
* ''Bouncing Bomb'' may go over enemies without exploding (will do so if it lands against walls).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} can block both the bomb's impact and its explosion (blocking the former will not prevent the latter).

w1.blurb: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' flings an explosive charge towards the target area, {{tip|sight|revealing}} its surroundings, and exploding after 4 seconds or upon reactivation.

When exploding the ''Satchel Charge'' deals {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} all surrounding enemies by 250 units. If '''Ziggs''' is within the explosion radius, he instead {{tip|dash|flies}} up to 400 units away while taking no damage in the process.

{{Cci|Satchel Charge Turret Explosion Indicator.png|border=false||{{sbc|Turret Explosion:}}}} ''Satchel Charge's'' explosion can demolish {{tip|turrets}} below a {{sti|health|{{as|'''percentile''' health}}}} threshold.
w1.name: Satchel Charge
notes: * ''Satchel Charge'' will explode immediately after landing if reactivated mid-flight.
* ''Satchel Charge's'' displacement obeys game physics (distance increases with proximity to the charge, resulting in being knocked straight up when aligned directly on top of it).
* ''Ziggs'' will not be displaced by ''Satchel Charge'' while {{si|Teleport|teleporting}} (will be while {{si|Recall|recalling}}, interrupting it in the process).

e1.blurb: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' scatters a cluster of 11 proximity mines over the target area, lasting for up to 10 seconds.
Mines explode on contact with an enemy, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and dealing {{as|magic damage}}. Targets detonating more than one mine take 40% damage from subsequent mines.
e1.name: Hexplosive Minefield
notes: * ''Hexplosive Minefield'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the target area for a short duration (on-cast and when each mine explodes).
* Each mine applies spell effects as area-of-effect despite dealing single-target damage.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single mine's worth of damage.

r1.blurb: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' deploys his ultimate creation, the [[File:Mega Inferno Bomb Minimap.png|20px|link=]] ''Mega Inferno Bomb'', hurling it to the target area, granting {{tip|sight}} within a 350 unit radius as it travels.
Upon reaching the target area, it explodes, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies caught in the blast, increased by 50% in the epicenter.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ {{fd|73.33}}% AP)}}|Enhanced Magic Damage|{{ap|200*1.5 to 400*1.5}} {{as|(+ 110% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
notes: * ''Mega Inferno Bomb'' can be blocked by {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} only at cast or at a certain angle upon landing.
* Allies cannot see ''Mega Inferno Bomb's'' area indicator until shortly before the blast.
* ''Mega Inferno Bomb'' takes {{fd|3.5}} seconds to land when ''Ziggs'' casts from maximum range (reduced to 2 seconds when casting point blank).
